summary: This document contains classified messages regarding Ray's contacts and activities in Europe, including discussions with individuals like Jervay, UNRUMBLE 6, and Cabrera. It also mentions Ray's efforts to recruit individuals for potential operations against Castro, his interactions with a KUBARK staffer, and his plans to identify and support disaffected elements within Cuba's embassies and officialdom.
title: Classified Messages Regarding Ray's Contacts and Activities in Europe
